xconf.desc: 客车平台存储服务配置

item.name: ManageFlag
item.comments: 消息服务配置管理测试开关 1启动消息服务直连，0通过节点管理处理

item.name: reconTimes
item.comments: 如果与节点管理器断开，设置重连时间(单位：S)

item.name: count
item.comments: 监控位置更新插件个数

item.name: commitFileTime
item.comments: 批量文件存储处理间隔时间(单位:S)

item.name: commitTrackCount
item.comments: 轨迹批量数据库提交数

item.name: commitAlarmCount
item.comments: 报警批量数据库提交数

item.name: commitEqCount
item.comments: 安全设备批量数据库提交数

item.name: commitTime
item.comments: 批量数据库提交间隔时间(单位:S)

item.name: eventfileurl
item.comments: 驾驶行为事件文件目录/usr/local/lbs/file/event

item.name: mysql_sql_updateVehicleisonline
item.value: UPDATE MEM_TB_SERVICEVIEW SET ISONLINE=?,SYSUTC=?,ISVALID=0,MSGID=? WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 更新车辆上下线的MYSQL轨迹表语句

item.name: sql_updateTrackisonline
item.value: UPDATE TR_VEHICLE_LASTTRACK SET ISONLINE=?,SYSUTC = ?,ISVALID=0,MSGID=?,POSITIONING=?,ACC=? WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 更新车辆上下线的ORACLE轨迹表语句

item.name: sql_updateVehicleisonlineTbl
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_ONOFFLINE SET TO_FLAG=?,TO_OFFUTC =? WHERE AUTO_ID= (SELECT MAX(AUTO_ID) FROM TH_VEHICLE_ONOFFLINE WHERE VID = ?)

item.name: sql_updateLastTrackLine
item.comments: 更新轨迹包带总线数据最后位置的SQL语句

item.name: sql_updateLastTrackALine
item.comments: 更新轨迹包带总线数据最后位置的SQL语句带报警

item.name: sql_updateLastTrack
item.comments: 更新轨迹包最后位置的SQL语句

item.name: sql_updateLastTrackA
item.comments: 更新轨迹包最后位置的SQL语句带报警

item.name: sql_updateLastTrackISonLine
item.value: UPDATE TR_VEHICLE_LASTTRACK SET ISONLINE=1,POSITIONING=0,SYSUTC=? WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 更新非法轨迹包更新在线状态

item.name: sql_saveDumpTrack
item.comments: 存储非法轨迹包的SQL语句

item.name: sql_updateAlarmTrack
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_ALARM SET ALARM_END_UTC = ?,END_LAT=?,END_LON=?,END_MAPLAT=?,END_MAPLON=?,END_ELEVATION=?,END_DIRECTION=?,END_GPS_SPEED=?,END_MILEAGE=?,END_OIL_TOTAL=?, ALARM_STATUS=0,ALARM_ADD_INFO_END =?,MAX_RPM=? WHERE ALARM_ID = ?
item.comments: 更新报警包结束时间的ORACLE语句

item.name: sql_updateVehicleLineStatus
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_STATUS SET GATHER_TIME = ?,TERMINAL_STATUS=?,TERMINAL_STATUS_VALUE=?,GPS_STATUS=?,GPS_STATUS_VALUE=?,E_WATER_TEMP_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,E_WATER_TEMP_STATUS,?),E_WATER_TEMP=DECODE(?,-1,E_WATER_TEMP,?),EXT_VOLTAGE_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,EXT_VOLTAGE_STATUS,?),EXT_VOLTAGE=DECODE(?,-1,EXT_VOLTAGE,?),OIL_PRESSURE_STATUS=?,OIL_PRESSURE=?,BRAKE_PRESSURE_STAUTS=?,BRAKE_PRESSURE=?,BRAKEPAD_FRAY_STATUS=?,BRAKEPAD_FRAY=?,OIL_ALARM_STATUS=?,OIL_ALARM=?,ABS_BUG_STATUS=?,ABS_BUG=?,COOLANT_LEVEL_STATUS=?,COOLANT_LEVEL=?,AIR_FILTER_CLOG_STATUS=?,AIR_FILTER_CLOG=?,MWERE_BLOCKING_STATUS=?,MWERE_BLOCKING=?,FUEL_BLOCKING_STATUS=?,FUEL_BLOCKING_ALARM=?,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM_STATUS=?,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM=?,RETARDER_HT_ALARM_STATUS=?,RETARDER_HT_ALARM=?,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM_STATUS=?,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM=?,VEHICLE_STATUS=?,AIR_PRESSURE_STATUS=DECODE(?,-1,AIR_PRESSURE_STATUS,?),AIR_PRESSURE=DECODE(?,-1,AIR_PRESSURE,?),GPS_FAULT_STATUS=?,GPS_FAULT=?,GPS_OPENCIRCUIT_STATUS=?,GPS_OPENCIRCUIT=?,GPS_SHORTCIRCUIT_STATUS=?,GPS_SHORTCIRCUIT=?,TEMINAL_UNDERVOLTAGE_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_UNDERVOLTAGE=?,TEMINAL_POWERDOWN_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_POWERDOWN=?,TEMINAL_SCREENFAULT_STATUS=?,TEMINAL_SCREENFAULT=?,TTS_FAULT_STATUS=?,TTS_FAULT=?,CAMERA_FAULT_STATUS=?,CAMERA_FAULT=? WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 更新车辆总线状态信息

item.name: mysql_sql_updateLastTrackLine
item.comments: 更新轨迹包最后位置的MYSQL语句

item.name: mysql_sql_updateLastTrackALine
item.comments: 更新轨迹包带总线数据最后位置的MYSQL语句带报警

item.name: mysql_sql_updateLastTrack
item.comments: 更新轨迹包最后位置的MYSQL语句

item.name: mysql_sql_updateLastTrackA
item.comments: 更新轨迹包带总线数据最后位置的MYSQL语句带报警

item.name: mysql_sql_updateAlarmTrack
item.value: UPDATE MEM_TH_VEHICLE_ALARM SET ALARM_END_UTC = ?,END_LAT=?,END_LON=?,END_MAPLAT=?,END_MAPLON=?,END_ELEVATION=?,END_DIRECTION=?,END_GPS_SPEED=?,END_MILEAGE=?,END_OIL_TOTAL=?,ALARM_STATUS=0,ALARM_ADD_INFO_END=?,MAX_RPM=? WHERE ALARM_ID = ?
item.comments: 更新报警包结束时间的MYSQL语句

item.name: mysql_sql_updateLastTrackISonLine
item.value: UPDATE MEM_TB_SERVICEVIEW SET ISONLINE=1,ISVALID=?,MSGID=? WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 更新非法轨迹包更新在线状态

item.name: mysql_sql_queryVehicleStatus
item.value: SELECT ALARMCODE FROM MEM_TB_SERVICEVIEW WHERE VID=?
item.comments: 查询车辆最新报警状态

item.name: count
item.comments: 监控指令存储插件个数

item.name: commitCommandCount
item.comments: 指令数据批量提交数量

item.name: commitMediaCount
item.comments: 多媒体数据批量提交数量

item.name: commitTime
item.comments: 批量数据库提交间隔时间(单位:S)

item.name: sql_updateUpControlCommand
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_COMMAND SET CO_STATUS=? ,CR_TIME=?,CR_RESULT=? WHERE CO_SEQ=?

item.name: sql_updateVehiclePicture
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_MEDIA SET MTYPE_CODE = ?,UTC = ?,MEDIA_URI = ?,LENS_NO = ?,LAT =?,LON=?,MAPLON=?,MAPLAT=?,ELEVATION=?,DIRECTION=?,GPS_SPEED=?,EVENTID=?,EVENT_STATUS=?,MFORMAT_CODE=?,EVENT_TYPE=?,DEVICE_NO=? WHERE MEDIA_ID = ( SELECT MEDIA_ID FROM (SELECT MEDIA_ID FROM TH_VEHICLE_MEDIA WHERE VID = ? AND (UTC IS NULL OR UTC = '') ORDER BY SYSUTC) WHERE ROWNUM < 2 )

item.name: sql_updateVehicleDispatchMsg
item.value: UPDATE TH_VEHICLE_DISPATCH_MSG SET UMSG_SRTIME = ?, SEND_RESULT = ?,DMSG_STATUS=? WHERE SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_updateTerminalParam
item.value: UPDATE TB_TERMINAL_HISTORY_PARAM SET SET_RESULT = ?, UPDATE_TIME = ?,UPDATE_BY = ? WHERE SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_updateLineSetting
item.value: UPDATE TR_LINE_VEHICLE SET SEND_COMMAND_STATUS = ?, UPDATE_TIME = ? WHERE SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_updateAreaSetting
item.value: UPDATE TR_BIND_AREA SET SEND_STATUS = ?, RECEIVE_UTC = ? WHERE SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_querySubType
item.value: SELECT CO_SUBTYPE FROM TH_VEHICLE_COMMAND WHERE CO_SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_checkTerminalParam
item.value: SELECT T.PARAM_ID FROM TB_TERMINAL_PARAM T WHERE T.TID = ( SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?)

item.name: sql_saveTerminalParam
item.value: INSERT INTO TB_TERMINAL_PARAM (PARAM_ID,TID,PARAM_VALUE,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME) VALUES(?,NVL((SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?),0),?,?,?)

item.name: sql_updateTerminalParamInfo
item.value: UPDATE TB_TERMINAL_PARAM SET PARAM_VALUE =?,UPDATE_TIME=? WHERE TID = (SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?) AND PARAM_ID = ?

item.name: sql_updateTerminalUpdaeInfoVersion
item.value: UPDATE TB_TERMINAL_UPDATEINFO SET FINSIH_FLAG = ?,FINISH_TIME=? WHERE INFO_ID = (SELECT MAX(INFO_ID) FROM TB_TERMINAL_UPDATEINFO WHERE VID = ?)

item.name: sql_updateTerminalVersion
item.value: UPDATE TB_TERMINAL SET TER_HARDVER =?,TER_SOFTVER = ? WHERE TID = (SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?)

item.name: sql_checkTerminalUpdaeInfoVersion
item.value: SELECT HARDWARE_VERSION,FIRMWARE_VERSION FROM TB_TERMINAL_UPDATEINFO WHERE INFO_ID = (SELECT MAX(INFO_ID) FROM TB_TERMINAL_UPDATEINFO WHERE VID = ?)

item.name: sql_updateVehicleLogOff
item.value: UPDATE TH_TERMINAL_REGISTER SET LOGOFFUTC=? WHERE UTC= (SELECT MAX(UTC) FROM TH_TERMINAL_REGISTER WHERE TID= (SELECT L.TMAC FROM TB_TERMINAL L WHERE TID=( SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?)) AND RESULT=0 ) AND TID=(SELECT L.TMAC FROM TB_TERMINAL L WHERE TID=( SELECT S.TID FROM TR_SERVICEUNIT S WHERE VID = ?))

item.name: sql_saveEticket
item.comments: 存储电子运单历史信息

item.name: sql_updateQuerstionAnswer
item.value: UPDATE TH_QUESTION_ANSWER T SET T.REPLY_UTC = ?, T.ANSWER_CONTENT = ? WHERE T.SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_updatePhotoSetting
item.value: UPDATE TH_PHOTO_SETTINGS_LOG SET SEND_STATUS = ? WHERE COMMAND_SEQ = ?

item.name: sql_selectDriverInfo
item.value: SELECT STAFF_ID,DRIVER_ICCARD FROM TB_EMPLOYEE WHERE STAFF_NAME = ? AND CARD_ID = ?

item.name: sql_updateSIMiccid
item.value: UPDATE TB_SIM SET ICCID_ELECTRON = ? WHERE COMMADDR = ? AND ENABLE_FLAG = 1

item.name: mysql_sql_updateUpControlCommand
item.value: UPDATE MEM_TH_VEHICLE_COMMAND SET CO_STATUS=?,CR_TIME=?,CR_RESULT=? WHERE CO_SEQ=?

item.name: mysql_sql_updateVehiclePicture
item.comments: 存储车辆拍照照片信息

item.name: sql_updateEngBugDispose
item.value: UPDATE KCPT.TH_ENG_BUG_DISPOSE SET CLEAR_FLAG=? WHERE CO_SEQ=?
item.comments: 更新发动机故障处理信息

item.name: sql_deleteEngVersionInfo
item.value: DELETE FROM KCPT.TB_ENG_VERSION WHERE VID=? AND VIN_CODE=? AND COMMADDR=?

item.name: sql_saveOrUpdateLockVehicleDetail
item.value: MERGE INTO TB_LOCK_VEHICLE_DETAIL T1 USING (SELECT ? AS PID,? AS VID,? AS VEHICLE_STATUS,? AS LOCK_TYPE,? AS MAX_RPM,? AS PRE_LOCK_TIME,? AS UPDATE_TIME FROM dual) T2 ON ( T1.VID=T2.VID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.VEHICLE_STATUS=T2.VEHICLE_STATUS,T1.LOCK_TYPE=T2.LOCK_TYPE,T1.MAX_RPM=T2.MAX_RPM,T1.PRE_LOCK_TIME=T2.PRE_LOCK_TIME,T1.UPDATE_TIME=T2.UPDATE_TIME WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PID,VID,VEHICLE_STATUS,LOCK_TYPE,MAX_RPM,PRE_LOCK_TIME,UPDATE_TIME) VALUES(T2.PID,T2.VID,T2.VEHICLE_STATUS,T2.LOCK_TYPE,T2.MAX_RPM,T2.PRE_LOCK_TIME,T2.UPDATE_TIME)
item.comments: 插入或者更新锁车信息

item.name: sql_updateUnlockCode
item.value: UPDATE KCPT.TB_LOCK_VEHICLE_DETAIL SET UNLOCK_CODE=?,VEHICLE_STATUS=? WHERE VID=?

item.name: sql_updateLockVehicleStatusStatement
item.value: UPDATE KCPT.TB_LOCK_VEHICLE_DETAIL SET VEHICLE_STATUS=?,UPDATE_TIME=? WHERE VID=?

item.name: DBReconnectWait
item.comments: 数据库断线重连延时(秒)

item.name: abandonedConnectionTimeout
item.comments: Sets the maximum time that a connection can remain unused before the connection is closed and returned to the cache(单位:S)

item.name: propertyCheckInterval
item.comments: Sets the time interval at which the cache manager inspects and enforces all specified cache properties (单位:S)

item.name: inactivityTimeout
item.comments: Sets the maximum time a physical connection can remain idle in a connection cache.(单位:S)

item.name: redisMaxWait
item.comments: 连接REDIS 超时时间(单位：秒)

item.name: redisMaxIdle
item.comments: 最大能够保持空闲状态的对象数

item.name: sql_queryAllVehicle
item.value: SELECT v.TYRE_R,v.REAR_AXLE_RATE,v.vehicle_no, S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,PLATE_COLOR AS plate_color_id,M.COMMADDR AS t_identifyno,T.OEM_CODE AS oemcode,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,V.VIN_CODE FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID WHERE COMMADDR IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG =1 AND T.ENABLE_FLAG =1
item.comments: 初始化加载所有车辆基本信息

item.name: sql_queryVehicleByMacid
item.value: SELECT S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,PLATE_COLOR AS plate_color_id,M.COMMADDR AS t_identifyno,T.OEM_CODE AS oemcode,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,vehicle_no,TYRE_R,REAR_AXLE_RATE,V.VIN_CODE FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID WHERE COMMADDR = ? AND T.OEM_CODE = ? AND V.ENABLE_FLAG =1 AND T.ENABLE_FLAG =1
item.comments: 如果内存中不存在当前车辆信息，则从数据库加载

item.name: update3GPhotoVehicleInfoSql
item.value: SELECT S.SUID,V.VID AS VID,PLATE_COLOR AS plate_color_id,M.COMMADDR AS t_identifyno,T.OEM_CODE AS oemcode,T.TMODEL_CODE,T.TID,vehicle_no,TYRE_R,REAR_AXLE_RATE,TD.DVR_SIMNUM,V.VIN_CODE FROM TB_SIM M INNER JOIN TR_SERVICEUNIT S ON S.SID = M.SID INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON V.VID = S.VID INNER JOIN TB_TERMINAL T ON T.TID = S.TID INNER JOIN KCPT.TB_DVR TD ON TD.DVR_ID = S.DVR_ID WHERE TD.DVR_SIMNUM IS NOT NULL AND V.ENABLE_FLAG =1 AND T.ENABLE_FLAG =1 AND T.TER_STATE=2
item.comments: 更新3G手机号对应MAC_ID的车辆信息

item.name: sql_queryVehicleStatusCode
item.value: SELECT V.VID, TERMINAL_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_TERMINAL_STATUS,MAX_TERMINAL_STATUS, GPS_STATUS_VALTYPE,MIN_GPS_STATUS,MAX_GPS_STATUS, E_WATER_TEMP_VALTYPE,MIN_E_WATER_TEMP,MAX_E_WATER_TEMP, EXT_VOLTAGE_VALTYPE,MIN_EXT_VOLTAGE,MAX_EXT_VOLTAGE, OIL_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_PRESSURE,MAX_OIL_PRESSURE, BRAKE_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKE_PRESSURE,MAX_BRAKE_PRESSURE, BRAKEPAD_FRAY_VALTYPE,MIN_BRAKEPAD_FRAY,MAX_BRAKEPAD_FRAY, OIL_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_OIL_ALARM,MAX_OIL_ALARM,ABS_BUG_VALTYPE, MIN_ABS_BUG,MAX_ABS_BUG,COOLANT_LEVEL_VALTYPE,MIN_COOLANT_LEVEL, MAX_COOLANT_LEVEL,AIR_FILTER_CLOG_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_FILTER_CLOG, MAX_AIR_FILTER_CLOG,MWERE_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_MWERE_BLOCKING, MAX_MWERE_BLOCKING,FUEL_BLOCKING_VALTYPE,MIN_FUEL_BLOCKING, MAX_FUEL_BLOCKING,EOIL_TEMPERATURE_VALTYPE,MIN_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM, MAX_EOIL_TEMPERATURE_ALARM,RETARDER_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_RETARDER_HT_ALARM, MAX_RETARDER_HT_ALARM,EHOUSING_HT_ALARM_VALTYPE,MIN_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM ,MAX_EHOUSING_HT_ALARM,AIR_PRESSURE_VALTYPE,MIN_AIR_PRESSURE,MAX_AIR_PRESSURE FROM TB_VSTATUS_REF S INNER JOIN TB_VEHICLE V ON S.VS_REF_ID = V.VS_REF_ID WHERE V.VID = ?
item.comments: 根据车辆ID查询车辆状态编码信息

item.name: sql_queryVehicleInfo
item.value: SELECT V.REAR_AXLE_RATE,V.TYRE_R,V.VEHICLE_NO,V.VIN_CODE,V.VLINE_ID,V.INNER_CODE, O.ENT_ID,O.ENT_NAME,E.ENT_ID AS EID, E.ENT_NAME AS ENAME, VS.STAFF_ID,EMP.STAFF_NAME,V.VBRAND_CODE FROM TB_VEHICLE V LEFT JOIN TB_ORGANIZATION O ON V.ENT_ID = O.ENT_ID LEFT JOIN TB_ORGANIZATION E ON E.ENT_ID = O.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN TR_VEHICLE_STAFF VS ON VS.VID = V.VID LEFT JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE EMP ON EMP.STAFF_ID = VS.STAFF_ID WHERE V.VID = ?
item.comments: 查询 后桥速比,轮胎滚动半径,车辆编号，车架号，企业编号，企业名称，车队编号，车队名称,车牌号、车辆内部编码、线路、司机

item.name: sql_queryAlarmType
item.value: SELECT ALARM_CODE ,ALARM_NAME,A_TYPE,PARENT_CODE FROM SYS_ALARM_TYPE WHERE PARENT_CODE != '-1'

item.name: sql_queryDeleteVehicle
item.value: SELECT VID FROM TB_VEHICLE WHERE ENABLE_FLAG='0' and UPDATE_TIME >?

item.name: sql_corpHasAlarmLevel
item.value: SELECT DISTINCT AET.ENT_ID FROM KCPT.TB_ALARM_ENT_CONF AET, KCPT.TB_ALARM_ENT_INFO AEI WHERE AET.SYS_ALARM_LEVEL_ID = 1 AND AEI.TB_ALARM_ENT_CONF_ID = AET.PID
item.comments: 查询有告警设置企业列表

item.name: sql_corpToListVid
item.value: SELECT TV.ENT_ID, VID FROM (SELECT T.ENT_ID FROM TB_ORGANIZATION T WHERE T.ENABLE_FLAG != 0 AND T.ENT_TYPE = 2 START WITH T.PARENT_ID = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR T.ENT_ID = T.PARENT_ID) ET, KCPT.TB_VEHICLE TV WHERE TV.ENABLE_FLAG = 1 AND TV.VEHICLE_STATE = 2 AND TV.ENT_ID = ET.ENT_ID
item.comments: 查询设置告警等级企业对应车辆LIST

item.name: sql_corpToListAlarm
item.value: SELECT AEI.SYS_ALARM_TYPE_ID FROM KCPT.TB_ALARM_ENT_CONF AET, KCPT.TB_ALARM_ENT_INFO AEI WHERE AEI.SYS_ALARM_TYPE_ID NOT LIKE 'A%' AND AEI.SYS_ALARM_TYPE_ID NOT LIKE 'B%' AND ENT_ID = ? AND AEI.TB_ALARM_ENT_CONF_ID = AET.PID
item.comments: 查询设置企业对应报警列表
